transcript: Bezos if you've heard any of his interviews seems like a very humble guy you could have a hundred billionaires in a room and he is worth the same amount as them each one of those billionaires is a thousand millionaires he's still worth the same amount as 100,000 millionaires there's just levels to it and I think the moment you get to Ego is the moment you stop growing because you feel like you beat the level but you just keep repeating the level rather than moving up because there is a harder boss and they just haven't faced it yet
